product_name: Planet Bike Protege 9.0 Wireless Bike Computer
long_description: The Planet Bike Protege 9.0 wireless bike computer is all you need to keep track of your car-free miles during commutes, training rides and touring trips. Digital wireless technology eliminates messy wires. 4-line MacroMonitor(TM) LCD displays up to 5 pieces of data at a glance. 9 functions include speed comparator, speed, average speed, maximum speed, ride time, distance, clock, dual odometer and temperature. Fits 25.0-31.8mm handlebars. Magnet fits up to 4mm bladed spokes.
short_description: The Planet Bike Protege 9.0 wireless bike computer is all you need to keep track of your car-free miles during commutes, training rides and touring trips.
